content.prompt: Which of the following is the best describes an example of transhumance?

choices.label: Ranchers in Canada who allow their cattle to graze over a wide area of flat land
Herders in Kenya who take their goats to a river basin each day for water
Shepherds in France who move their sheep to mountain pastures each summer
Farmers in Peru who raise their llamas on land that used to be tropical rain forest
Traders in Mongolia who maintain a herd of camels and a herd of yaks

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe a relevant geographic concept, process, model, or theory in a specified context.
